page.title: 06PARK FARM
page.content: THE FARM UNDER REVIEW BELONGS TO MR WHITING IT IS SITUATED IN GAYHURST ON THE NORTHHAMTION ROAD.THE FARM IS ABOUT 400 ACRES WHICH IS MADE UP OF 232 ACRES ARABLE LAND WHICH IS DIVIDED UP LIKE SO 84 ACRES OF WHEET.38 ACRES OF OATS AND 79 ACRES OF BARLEY.1 ACRE OF POTATOES,18 ACRES BEANS AND 12 ACRES OF SEED. THERE IS 172 ACRES OF GRASS 62 ACRES OF WHICH IT IS TO BE MOWED AND BALED FOR HAY.THE OTHER 110 ACRES IS PERMANANT PASTURE AND IS USED TO KEEP A FLOCK OF 298 EWES AND 80 CATTLE.THE FARM ALSO HAS 4 GEESE.THERE ARE 4 TRACTORS AND 1 COMBINE AS WELL AS MANY OTHER IMPLEMENTS.ALL THE LAMBS AND CALVES ARE REARED AND THEN USED AS STOCK REPLACEMENTS OR GO TO MARKET.
